subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Stephen Curry scored 44 points in a dazzling performance that could not keep his friend LeBron James in his seat, leading No. 22 Davidson to a 72-67 victory over North Carolina State on Saturday in Charlotte, N.C.
snippet: Stephen Curry scored 44 points in a dazzling performance that could not keep his friend LeBron James in his seat, leading No. 22 Davidson to a 72-67 victory over North Carolina State on Saturday in Charlotte, N.C.
